titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the manufacturing deduction provided by the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004 with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities in any possession of the United States, and for other purposes.

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the manufacturing deduction provided by the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004 with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities in any possession of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the tax deduction for income related to domestic production activities for production activities in possessions of the United States.
